sections.heading: Trail Easement Property Tax Exemption Act, how cited
sections.text: Sections 77-213 to 77-218 shall be known and may be cited as the Recreational Trail Easement Property Tax Exemption Act.SourceLaws 2025, LB647, ยง 1.Operative Date: January 1, 2026
